entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
